items.title: Wildmoor Whisky SG - Home
items.keyWords: WILDMOOR Dark Moorland 23 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky, WILDMOOR Rugged Coast 30 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky, WILDMOOR Black Mountain 40 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky,  WILDMOOR Waking Forest 23 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky, WILDMOOR Tropical Coast 30 Year Old Blended Scotch Whisky
items.description: WILDMOOR - A Whisky More Wild. Drawn from the William Grant & Sons family private reserve of whiskies -  these are extremely rare and prestige liquids from far-flung distilleries all over Scotland, some of which are lost forever.

items.kvAnimationComponentKvTitle: A drop of wilderness in every glass

items.storyChapterTwoComponentDescription: Drawn from William Grant & Sons Family Private Reserve, Wildmoor is the cumulation of a decades-long mission to collect the rarest and most prestigious of aged whiskies.

items.listDescription: 一年中和一生中的秋天，时光很短暂，但是...

items.description: A whisky of deep fruit and zesty spice
items.description1: with a smooth finish, inspired by the
items.descriptionmoble: A whisky of deep fruit and zesty spice with a smooth finish, inspired by the white sandy beaches of Scotland’s northwestern islands.
items.inspiredmoble: Inspired by the northwest islands of Scotland and their white sandy beaches in summer

items.description: Experience waves of bonfire smoke, sea
items.description1: salt and vanilla sweetness, balanced with
items.description2: sherry spice. A whisky inspired by
items.descriptionmoble: Experience waves of bonfire smoke, sea salt and vanilla sweetness, balanced with sherry spice. A whisky inspired by Scotland’s rugged coastlines.
items.inspiredmoble: Inspired by the rugged Coastlines of Scotland

items.description: A vibrant combination of deep vanilla
items.description1: oak and subtle sherry spice, inspired
items.descriptionmoble: A vibrant combination of deep vanilla oak and subtle sherry spice, inspired by Scotland’s vast ancient woodlands.
items.inspiredmoble: Inspired by the verdant forests of Scotland

items.inspired: Inspired by the great dark mountain
items.description: A towering peak of flavour, where vanilla
items.description1: and caramel notes meet an indulgent
items.description2: sherry richness. The pinnacle of the
items.descriptionmoble: A towering peak of flavour, where vanilla and caramel notes meet an indulgent sherry richness. The pinnacle of the Wildmoor range.
items.inspiredmoble: Inspired by the great dark mountain peaks of Scotland’s north.  The Summit of the range.

items.inspired: Inspired by the darker wintered Moorlands of Scotland
items.description: An epic landscape of rich oak, deep vanilla
items.description1: and mellow sherry spice, inspired by
items.descriptionmoble: An epic landscape of rich oak, deep vanilla and mellow sherry spice, inspired by Scotland's wind-swept moorlands.
items.inspiredmoble: Inspired by the darker wintered Moorlands of Scotland
